thread.title: Kit Siang hopes Zaid will be team player, not prima donna
thread.title_full: Kit Siang hopes Zaid will be team player, not prima donna

title: Kit Siang hopes Zaid will be team player, not prima donna
text:
More 
DAP supremo Lim Kit Siang hopes that party newcomer Zaid Ibrahim can learn to be a team player. 
Lim said he has known Zaid for a long time, describing him as a believer in truthful and honest politics. 
"But if he had a defect, it is that he needs to learn to be a team play and not a prima donna," he said in jest, to laughter from those present at Zaid's house in Petaling Jaya today.
